data.title: Where Is University of Houston?
data.meta_description: Learn more about the location of University of Houston using this detailed map. See where UH is and what the surrounding neighborhood is like.
data.text:
Check out the location and the area surrounding University of Houston so you can see exactly where the school is. Is the campus close enough to home for your liking? Be sure you can enjoy the area around the campus, too.

Why Location Matters

You won't spend all of your on campus when you attend the school. You should know if the area arround UH is in a safe neighborhood and how close it is to other cities in the general area.

University of Houston Location and Map

University of Houston is a public institution situated in Houston, Texas. Houston is a great location for students who prefer city over country life.

Location of University of Houston

Contact details for UH are given below.
